thread.title: Another Positive Experience at PI
thread.title_full: Another Positive Experience at PI - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: bonniejen
title: Another Positive Experience at PI
text:
Stayed at the PI Aldgate last October while visiting London for a week with my daughter. The location in east London is easily accessible by public transportation. Closest tube station is Aldgate which is a 5 minute walk to hotel. Hotel was spotless, although it was very busy during that particular week as it was a school holiday in Europe.
Overall, no complaints. We would definitely stay there again!
